statements: SELECT * FROM flooding_areas;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM flooding_areas;
SELECT area_name, elevation FROM flooding_areas ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT * FROM flooding_areas WHERE elevation > 100;
SELECT area_name AS name, elevation AS height FROM flooding_areas;
SELECT * FROM flooding_areas WHERE area_name = 'City Center';
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM flooding_areas WHERE elevation > 1000 ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, elevation FROM flooding_areas WHERE area_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT area_id, area_name, elevation FROM flooding_areas WHERE elevation BETWEEN 500 AND 1500 ORDER BY elevation ASC, area_id DESC;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM flooding_areas WHERE elevation < 500 OR area_name LIKE '%East%';
SELECT * FROM areas_prone_to_flooding;
SELECT area_name, elevation FROM areas_prone_to_flooding ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM areas_prone_to_flooding WHERE elevation > 100;
SELECT * FROM land_features WHERE elevation < 50;
SELECT feature_name, elevation FROM land_features ORDER BY feature_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM areas_prone_to_flooding WHERE elevation > 100 ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, elevation, feature_id FROM areas_prone_to_flooding JOIN land_features ON areas_prone_to_flooding.elevation = land_features.elevation;
SELECT * FROM areas_prone_to_flooding JOIN land_features ON areas_prone_to_flooding.area_id = land_features.feature_id WHERE elevation < 50 ORDER BY elevation ASC, area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name AS name, elevation AS height FROM areas_prone_to_flooding WHERE area_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7);
SELECT area_name, AVG(elevation) AS avg_elevation FROM areas_prone_to_flooding GROUP BY area_name HAVING avg_elevation > 75 ORDER BY avg_elevation DESC;
SELECT * FROM areas;
SELECT area_name, elevation FROM areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM land_features ORDER BY feature_name DESC;
SELECT feature_name, elevation FROM land_features WHERE elevation > 100;
SELECT event_name, date FROM flooding_events WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM areas;
SELECT area_name, elevation FROM areas ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT area_name, elevation FROM areas WHERE elevation > 1000;
SELECT e.event_name, a.area_name FROM flooding_events e JOIN areas a ON e.area_id = a.area_id;
SELECT f.feature_name, f.elevation, a.area_name FROM land_features f JOIN areas a ON f.area_id = a.area_id ORDER BY f.elevation ASC;
SELECT * FROM elevation_data;
SELECT location_name, elevation FROM elevation_data WHERE elevation > 1000;
SELECT location_name, elevation FROM elevation_data ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT area_name, affected_population FROM affected_areas WHERE affected_population > 5000 ORDER BY affected_population ASC;
SELECT location_id, report_date, flood_level FROM flood_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM elevation_data ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT location_name, elevation FROM elevation_data WHERE elevation > 1000;
SELECT location_name, elevation FROM elevation_data WHERE elevation BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, COUNT(*) AS report_count FROM flood_reports GROUP BY location_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

SELECT location_name, prediction_date, flood_probability FROM flood_predictions INNER JOIN affected_areas ON flood_predictions.location_id = affected_areas.location_id WHERE affected_population > 5000 ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM areas WHERE elevation > 1000
SELECT id, name FROM rivers WHERE length < 500
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM measurements WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY value ASC
SELECT location_id, elevation_change FROM observations WHERE elevation_change < 0
SELECT * FROM areas
SELECT name, elevation FROM areas WHERE elevation > 1000
SELECT rivers.name, rivers.length, locations.name FROM rivers JOIN locations ON rivers.source_area = locations.name
SELECT measurements.value, measurements.measurement_date, locations.name FROM measurements JOIN locations ON measurements.location_id = locations.id
SELECT observations.observation_date, observations.elevation_change, locations.latitude, locations.longitude FROM observations JOIN locations ON observations.location_id = locations.id
